product_name: MACStudio Fix 24-Hour Smooth Wear Fluid Correcting Concealer
summary: SummaryMAC Studio Fix 24-Hour Smooth Wear Concealer is a lightweight liquid concealer with a wand applicator that offers all day 24-hour wear with medium-to-full buildable concealer coverage and a natural matte finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight fluid concealer with medium-to-full buildable coverageBrightening, correcting natural matte finishPerfect for undereye and precision touch-upsSkin looks smoother, even and selfie-readyProvides seamless concealer coverage, blurs imperfections and offers long-lasting comfortable wearThis all-day concealer formula wears up to 24 hoursFeaturesSkin looks fresh and perfected with a natural matte concealer finish that's never cakeySmooths skinDoes not cause acneLong-wearing, 24 hoursNon-settling, 24 hoursNon-streaking, 24 hoursNon-caking, 24 hours,Provides stay-true color, 24 hoursTransfer, sweat, humidity, and water-resistantOil-freeFormulated WithoutFragranceOilFormaldehydeHydroquinoneTriclosanCoal TarTolueneSodium Laureth SulfateGlutenPhthalateParabenMineral OilPetrolatumPolyethyleneLauryl SulfateOxybenzoneItem 2532143How To UseFor smooth, even, selfie-ready skin, apply concealer using the wand applicator under eyes, over blemishes, dark spots or anywhere else you want all-day coverage. Blend without compromising coverage by tapping concealer into skin with your ring finger or a concealer brush.MAC Artist Tip for Contouring:To sculpt and contour, try a shade that's two-to-three times deeper than your skin tone. Using the wand applicator, stripe on a small amount of concealer directly under cheekbones where a shadow would naturally occur.Blend concealer with your finger or a contour brush using sweeping and circular motions until there are no hard lines.Finish the look by dusting a blush like Mineralize Blush in Dainty on the apples of cheeks.IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Water\Aqua\Eau, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Butylene Glycol, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Tribehenin, Magnesium Sulfate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone, Methicone, Silica, Nylon-12, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Algae Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Glycerin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Laureth-7, Xanthan Gum, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Sorbic Acid, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499)]Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For smooth, even, selfie-ready skin, apply concealer using the wand applicator under eyes, over blemishes, dark spots or anywhere else you want all-day coverage. Blend without compromising coverage by tapping concealer into skin with your ring finger or a concealer brush.MAC Artist Tip for Contouring:To sculpt and contour, try a shade that's two-to-three times deeper than your skin tone. Using the wand applicator, stripe on a small amount of concealer directly under cheekbones where a shadow would naturally occur.Blend concealer with your finger or a contour brush using sweeping and circular motions until there are no hard lines.Finish the look by dusting a blush like Mineralize Blush in Dainty on the apples of cheeks.

reviews.headline: Works good for me
reviews.comments: This is my first time using a liquid concealer and I actually like it. I have always used concealer in a tube and when MAC discontinued what I was using, I was told to try a liquid. This blends in really good and I was able to find a good match for my skin and it goes well with the powder that I already use.

reviews.headline: Ok concealter
reviews.comments: I prefer the studio finish concealer spf 35 broad spectrum.  Got way more coverage than this one.

reviews.headline: It's not for the dark circle girlie
reviews.comments: No coverage! Just the same formula as the foundation.

reviews.headline: Best concealer
reviews.comments: Covers nicely and brightens my under eyes without creasing and color was perfect üëåüèª

reviews.headline: This concealer is the Truth
reviews.comments: I don't use all MAC products. However, this concealer works for me. I've used this brand for many years. I've tried other brands for comparison but they did not provide the coverage that I needed to conceal the dark circles and fine lines. This brand states 24-hour smooth wear and it provides just that. I use a setting powder as well. A little goes a long way. MAC do not change the formula.

reviews.headline: Newest top pick
reviews.comments: I was in a pinch and needed a new undereye concealer for a wedding that would last the whole day/night without creasing or fading. An employee recommended this product and as someone that loves trying a variety of brands and products I was hesitant to purchase a concealer I had not heard anything about before. I can attest the staying power was excellent and the texture blended right in without creasing. My makeup looked great for the whole wedding and my under-eyes didn't crease or have flashback in photos.

reviews.headline: Best under eye cover up for me !
reviews.comments: Love it for dark circles under these 66 year old eyes ü§®

reviews.headline: Decent
reviews.comments: Decent coverage if severe issues expect 25% improvement

reviews.headline: Excellent product
reviews.comments: Lightweight, goes on smoothly and doesn't settle into fine lines.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Went on smooth and blends very well.

reviews.headline: The best concealer
reviews.comments: I tried this concealer in one the events in my city. Employee were the best and recommended this concealer for a first timer. I LOVE IT! it doesn't make my skin look cakey as if it I didn't have any bags at all.

reviews.headline: Mac Studio fix concealer
reviews.comments: it blends well just is watery and is very light.

reviews.headline: My only concealer
reviews.comments: There is no concealer on the market better than mac!! I use nc45 & it's perfect. Color corrector all in one.. never cakey. Ugh just the best!

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I had been using this for almost a year and had been going thru a bunch of different foundations as I thought they were breaking me out but come to find out it was actually this I was putting in my trouble spots (my cheeks) vegire foundation. Thank goodness my bff helped me to realize it wasn't the foundation. This stuff dripped off the applicator onto my clothes a few times also and didn't stay put on my face either. It looked ok at first but once I would put foundation over it, it would disappear. Overall I would not recommend this.

reviews.headline: Not sure if I would purchase again
reviews.comments: I recently developed dark circles and under eye bags. Honestly, I'm looking for a "miracle"product  to help disguise these bags and dark circles. I will be honest this concealer has lightened the dark circles a bit, but has not gotten rid of them totally.

reviews.headline: Love ‚ù§Ô∏è
reviews.comments: My favorite product. I can't live without my Concealer.

reviews.headline: Loved it
reviews.comments: Loved the coverage

reviews.headline: yes i woulld buy this again
reviews.comments: 3 stars because I've received bottles that was not filled as usual, otherwise the product is awesome and it covers all of my imperfections and just makes me glow!!

reviews.headline: I WOULD ABSOLUTELY BUY THIS PRODUCT AGAIN AND AGAIN
reviews.comments: I LOVE THESE PRODUCTS, HOWEVER I RECEIVED LIKE NOT SO FULL CONTAINERS MORE THAN ONCE.  OTHERWISE I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received this product free in exchange for my honest review. The color I chose was a poor match, so I couldn't do a true wear test (where I go outside using the product). When I used it at home, there was a faint scent and the concealer consistency seemed initially creamy, but dried matte. It claims to self-set once it dries into the skin, but that it can be also set with powder to prevent creasing and maintaining longterm coverage.

I applied it with a brush, as directed, and tested out its self-setting claims by setting one under-eye with translucent powder and leaving the other alone except to press it in with a dry beauty blender (also as directed). I'm far from a MUA, so this could be due to my skill level, but I noticed it looked more cakey with powder than without. I found more separation in the lines under my eyes on the side with the powder, but saw slight transfer on the non-powder side when testing with a tissue. With proof of transfer, I'd say I'd definitely prefer setting with powder than without. 

I also used a small amount of product to test coverage for hyperpigmentation and red spots on my face. I tend to prefer lighter coverage, so it provided a good amount of sheer coverage while still letting my skin look like skin. I tried adding more product to test a more full coverage solution, and it looked a bit dry. I was able to make it more skin-like by spraying fix+ after the fact.

pros:
- applies creamy, dries matte
- nice light coverage
- skin-like with less product
- buildable coverage

cons:
- any self-setting claims are very slight
- has a light scent
- more product looks less natural without fix+
faceoff_positive.headline: buildable coverage

faceoff_negative.comments:
As a longtime Mac user and learning to forgoe liquid foundation for concealer with powder, I was deeply disappointed after much anticipation. MAC is transforming from leader to follower and they're failing.
I love that they give you a lot of concealer for the price, but the applicator is way too big and A LOT of product comes out of the tube. And, there's no way to put it back in.
It goes on thick and goopy, but if you wait five minutes, it dries down enough to blend. But, it will rub off while blending, so you have to reapply and reblend. Even after you set it, it will rub off.
I returned this because I also bought the Shape Tape concealer mini at the same time. That stuff is DA BOMB! I just returned the MAC today after trying it for a week. Sold on Shape Tape.
faceoff_negative.headline: Biggest Disappointment
